name: Dom and Larry
description:
A quick arcade style game where you play as a mouse.

The game gets faster and faster as you play.

ASDW to move, Space to dash. Or...

Arrow keys to move and Enter to dash.

Walk into Mouse Hole to go inside. When inside, arrow keys to change Mouse Hole. Enter or Space to leave the Mouse Hole.

It's a work in progress. The Sounds are all just open source sounds. I used the 8-Bit Fantasy and Adventure Music Pack by xDeviruchi.
Link to that music pack here: https://xdeviruchi.itch.io/8-bit-fantasy-adventure-music-pac
